segments.text: I notice the water running over the edge of the sink, creating a mess on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman seems completely oblivious to it, which is hard to believe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the boy climbing on that wobbly stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me nervous to see him like that; he could fall any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is being cautious, standing beside him and waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she's smart to avoid climbing on the stool herself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kitchen looks so ordinary, but there's so much going wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder why the woman hasn't noticed any of this yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful compared to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I should do something to prevent an accident.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is making me feel a bit anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR
